results.title: Metformin limits the tumourigenicity of iPS cells without affecting their pluripotency
results.text_hl: Compared to the mean @<m>DISEASE_Teratoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013724 @@@teratoma@@@ size in the untreated control group (mean+-SD = 9703+-1497 mm3), the mean @<m>DISEASE_Teratoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013724 @@@teratoma@@@ size in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated group was drastically smaller (925+-26 mm3) after 40 days of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment (Fig. 2A).

citations.NLM: Vazquez-Martin A, Cufi S, Lopez-Bonet E, Corominas-Faja B, Oliveras-Ferraros C, Martin-Castillo B, Menendez JA. Metformin limits the tumourigenicity of iPS cells without affecting their pluripotency Sci Rep. 2012;2():964. PMID: 23236586
